attributes.action: Law to stop politicians lying to the public to get votes make them accountable
attributes.additional_details:
Politicians saying we will honour the democratic vote and leave the EU with or without a deal.
Laws been written then not enforced.
We are told this is the law then it’s not carried out. 
One of two things is happening. Either we are been lied to or the politicians are breaking the law. 
They should be accountable for both.
This would be the first step in making a true Time to make politicians stand up and be counted and not used had pawns
attributes.background:
Many politicians are making statements blatantly lying to the public. 
This is stopping the public from having the  confidence to vote not knowing who to trust.
They say one thing and then tactically vote another.
We need to make them accountable by Law.
Stop the Anarchists
